name: Living Dollhouse
description:
This game, developed for Android smartphones, will allow you to have your own virtual house populated by living dolls.

At the moment, the following is implemented in the game:
● two default dolls, each of which has its own personal daily routine. The name, work and hobbies of the character are indicated in his personal file (II - "My dolls");
● when dolls perform actions related to their work, a salary is credited to the game account. An in-game currency counter is located at the top of the screen (Dolls do their work autonomously);
● the player can buy new dolls in the "My Dolls" section. Dolls available for purchase are marked with a $. (Currently available for purchase is a cat for 200).
